AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Raymond McMillon: Defendant who allegedly transported aliens with Williams, identified by De La Cruz and Hernandez-Gomez as the person motioning for them to hide, argued against the conspiracy conviction
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Zeba Williams: Individual allegedly transporting aliens with McMillon, part of the conspiracy
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Ramon De La Cruz: Unlawful alien testifying at trial, identified McMillon as the person motioning for them to hide, arranged to pay thousands of dollars to be smuggled into the United States
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Jorge Miguel Hernandez-Gomez: Unlawful alien testifying at trial, identified McMillon as the person motioning for them to hide, arranged to pay thousands of dollars to be smuggled into the United States
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Eric Camacho: Border Patrol Agent testifying about how aliens or their families commonly pay smugglers indirectly, provided evidence supporting the pecuniary purpose special finding
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Raymond McMillon and Zeba Williams: Defendants who allegedly transported aliens together, subject of the conspiracy conviction
